item.description:
DimSum brunch at China Pearl, 9 Tyler St, Boston! Various dishes are brought around on carts so you can choose, order by the plate, and share. Estimated cost 10-15. per person, depending on what you order. This is a super fun way to wake up on a Sunday :) and we can try for some conversation practice, too! Welcome to bring non-Chinese speaking friends.

Meet outside the restaurant at 10:45, there may be a short wait.

Note: If 3 people rsvp, we're on! Otherwise, we'll reschedule for a later date. C'mon!

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Dim Sum this Sunday? 11am, China Pearl
